'''14w34d''' is the fifty-second and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 20, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140822005833/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w34a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w34d|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> which fixes some bugs and crashes from [[14w34a]], [[14w34b]], and [[14w34c]]. It was announced that it would likely be the last snapshot before the [[Java Edition 1.8-pre1|1.8 pre-release]].<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|502074037133008896|There will be another snapshot today, and then... hopefully... today will be the last day of snapshots for 1.8|August 20, 2014}}</ref> This is also the final snapshot released in 2014.
